name: The Stocker
description:
The Stocker is a video game being developed by students from the SAE Institute as their final project. You control a wise wizard who is preparing dungeons for daring adventures to explore.
The Stocker is the result of two years of study to learn and develops skills in Audio engineering, Video game development, Graphic design, and Animation.

Credits:

Project Lead & Programmer - James Collins

Tech Lead & Programmer - Jordan Miles

Animation - Ellen Roberts, Timothy Kelly

Graphics Design - Maddy Benporath

Sound Designer - Patrick Matyevich
